1 Lesson 1 Getting Ready 1.1 Get R and Rstudio We need to Download R from CRAN Install Rjust use the default settings Download RStudio from RStudio/posit Install RStudio 1.2 Use RStuio to install R packages Open RStudio. Click on File>New File>R Script, next copy the following R code and paste it to the screen called Untitled1 install.packages(c("dplyr", "tidyr")) install.packages("ggplot2") install.packages("data.table") Run each line of code by i) moving the cursor in that line; ii) pressing down Ctrl key then clicking on Enter key 1.3 Explore Rstudio Tasks : Figure out how to create a new project, called my_proj_1 Figure out how to create an R script, called try_1.R, which is under the just created project my_proj_1 and contains the following R code 1+1 print("Hello World!") rnorm(5) Figure out how to run R code in try_1.R: a) line by line; b) all three lines together.
